wikipedia_page.main: Ronald "Ron" "Ronnie" Walker (4 February 1932 – 29 October 2017) was an English footballer who played as an outside left for Doncaster Rovers and Bath City.

response: Ronald or Ron Walker may refer to:
*Ron Walker (businessman) (Ronald Joseph Walker, 1939–2018), Australian businessman and Lord Mayor of Melbourne
*Ron Walker (English footballer) (born 1932), English football player for Doncaster Rovers and Bath City
